text: Kung Fu Powerhouse () is a 1973 Hong Kong action drama movie directed by Lung Chien and starring Kang Chin and Yasuaki Kurata. == Plot == Kuo Fu, a drug trafficker, escapes jail. Another prisoner insists on following him even after he escapes. Kuo suspects that is a cop under an assumed name.Kung Fu Powerhouse ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 action movies Category:1973 drama movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lung Chien
title: Kung Fu Powerhouse
